items.translated_title: FBI says ATM ‘jackpotting’ attacks are on the rise, and netting hackers millions in stolen cash

images.alt: an animated GIF of an ATM dispensing wads of cash on stage at the Black Hat conference in 2009.

items.content: The FBI says hacks that trick ATMs into spitting out cash on demand are rising, with hundreds of attacks in the past year alone netting hackers millions in stolen bills.
